name: The World Of Giggleflight
description: 100 years ago there was peace in the 7 nations, Flutterbud of the fairies, Elvsgard of the fearless elves, The Evergreen home to the clever witches, Valarant the city of fierce dragons. Globbish an entire kingdom of cunning globlins, Opha Island home to the magic Nymphs and Tildud of the conniving nomads. Then  all of a sudden after a great dispute Globbish declared war on the elves. All 7 nations scurried to their trusted allies.  Flutterbud, Elvsgard and The Evergreen went to the same side. Valarant and Globbish fought together and Opha Island remained neutral along with Tildud. Padma, the protaganist, needs to find away to save the world and end the war!
